author: Devin Coldewey
title: AI and big data won’t work miracles in the fight against coronavirus
description: To someone with a hammer, every problem looks like a nail — and as expected, the tech sector is hard at work hammering every nail it can find. But the analytical prowess of the modern data ecosystem is especially limited when attempting to tackle the problem …
